name: Light and Dark (Interface)
description:
Top-down action adventure.

Ludum Dare 51 jam submission for "every 10 seconds".

Please rate at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/light-and-dark

Solo jam game. Made with Unity. Art from Kenney.nl. Sound effects from FreeSounds.org

Every 10 seconds, light and dark shift. Every level has different challenges and mechanics based on the dark/light shading.

Intro level, 4 challenge levels, final boss level.
